pd_0_com_0text: Hey, I'm new in town. My name's [PName]. What is there to do for fun around here?
pd_0_com_1text: You'll have to excuse me. I have trouble ignoring such alluring people.
pd_0_com_2text: Hey, I'm... I mean, uhh, you'll... never mind.
pd_1_com_0text: I occasionally volunteer helping out at the church or the markets... Oh! And my name is Kallista.
pd_2_com_0text: I have noticed the nearby dungeons just off of the town.
pd_3_com_0text: Dont worry, my friend, I can be your shield! I'm a paladin of Torm, and proficient in the revitalize spell. If you can pull your weight, I think we could make a suitable team.
pd_4_com_0text: I apologise. Charisma helps me access divine magic... My name is Kallista by the way.
pd_5_com_0text: You sound like a valuable ally. I could use your help exploring the dungeons if you'd assist me?
pd_6_com_0text: You're asking if I want to help protect the town...AND smite evil? Lets go!
pd_7_com_0text: If the rumours are true, the monsters that dwell within them have even been posing a threat to the village.
pd_8_com_0text: If I see to it to venture into the dungeons would you be able to help me? It's dangerous to go alone after all.
pd_11_com_1text: Tell me something from your past
pd_11_com_2text: Tell me about your likes / dislikes
pd_12_com_0text: What would you like to know?
pd_13_com_0text: Could you tell me something about yourself?
pd_var_14_0: I often exercise when I have time. It helps to stay in peak physical condition, especially in this career.
pd_var_14_1: I like to browse the markets. and admire the crafts of different artisans. It's nice to remember what I fight for sometimes.
pd_var_14_2: Star gazing is quite enjoyable. sometimes the stars guide me, other times its simply calming. I find It keeps me grounded in my duties.
pd_15_com_0text: How do you feel about us?
pd_16_com_0text: I've been fooled by sweet words before, but you seem to mean what you say. We can continue to work together.
pd_17_com_0text: You've proven reliable so far. I'm glad to have found someone I can count on.
pd_18_com_0text: I'm glad I found you. So few in this town have kept pace with me and things were getting lonely if I'm honest.
pd_19_com_0text: I don't want to seem too proud, but I think we make an excellent team. You can count on me to fight by your side any time you wish.
pd_20_com_0text: Where are you from? What brought you here?
pd_21_com_0text: I feel this is where I'm meant to be. The people here need me.
pd_22_com_0text: My parents were less than kind, I'll say that. I guess I just wanted to make my own way through life.
pd_23_com_0text: When I came into this world, I was born to a human mother and a demon father. You can imagine the complications that came from that. I didn't want to follow in their footsteps so I came here to help people.
pd_24_com_0text: One day when I was still young, I wandered into the city by myself. My criminal parents were off robbing a jewellery store I think and I realised I didn't know my way back home. The streets get so confusing. A merchant saw me, though. He must have thought I was an urchin. A lone kid all by herself and he gave me a coin. I didn't have to do anything for it. That kindness is why I fight to protect people.
pd_25_com_0text: What do you like? What do you hate?
pd_var_26_0: Well, my favourite colour is yellow. It feels optimistic for me. It helps to remind me of my faith.
pd_var_26_1: Apples are great. All the nutrients needed for adventuring provided willingly by nature... and they're delicious too.
pd_var_26_2: Well I'm not too fond of lamb or veal. I don't really like the idea of eating baby animals.
pd_27_com_0text: What can you tell me about your abilities?
pd_30_com_0text: Oh how generous, but how will we divide it up to feed the orphans?
pd_31_com_0text: This wand feels… vile. I appreciate the thought, but you don’t need my permission to destroy these things.
pd_32_com_0text: I had no idea you also answered a higher calling. Perhaps we can discuss our faiths when we have more spare time.
pd_33_com_0text: I don’t think these will offer the protection that my current greaves do. But these do look dangerous. Perhaps it is better they are out of harm’s way.
pd_34_com_0text: I don’t think this is the right type of equipment for my mace, but I admire your attention to weapon maintenance. Perhaps the city guard could still use it
pd_35_com_0text: Oh how lovely! You just wanted to give your money to a good cause! I greatly respect that about you. They will be a good source of sustinace on our adventures as we smite evil.
pd_36_com_0text: You really care about those less fortunate than you, don’t you? It is an honour to have you as my friend, [PName]
pd_37_com_0text: This dagger, it speaks to me… I don’t think I like what it says.
pd_38_com_0text: I understand this would benefit some metallic dragons who are champions of good, but… I personally don’t know where we would find such a creature.
pd_42_com_0text: I really enjoyed spending time with you. We sure make a great team.
pd_42_com_1text: Are you a sorcerer? Because your beauty is inate.
pd_43_com_0text: Agreed! It has been wonderful fighting side by side.
pd_44_com_0text: I admire your boldness, but I do hope you're not getting distracted from our task.
pd_45_com_0text: We have been through so much together now.
pd_45_com_1text: You and I are a natural crit, how about we take things to the next level?
pd_46_com_0text: You are an excellent partner! no villian has gone past us unscathed.
pd_47_com_0text: You know I'm unskilled in sleight of hand. I believe you gave it willingly.
pd_48_com_0text: N-no! I'm a Paladin!... and a Tiefling
pd_49_com_0text: I'm glad you think so. I feel the same way.
pd_50_com_0text: I really feel like we get along famously.
pd_50_com_1text: You must be a rogue with high dexterity, because you've stolen my heart.
